title: New Creator: Red Shogo
body:
Name: Red Shogo
Socials - 
https://www.tiktok.com/@redshogo?lang=en
https://www.twitch.tv/redshogo

Info - Red, one half of the infamous Shogo twins, is known for his funny TikTok videos with his brother. Now, he's going hard into the world of gaming and plans to use the power of Rally and $RED coin to tie together his fan bases and build the most engaged community on the internet. 

Use Cases - 
Launch - $RED coins will be distributed via a giveaway to his existing Twitch subs, and through his announcement TikTok for his new coin.
Holding - $RED coins will give access to fan games, early merch drops (relaunching merch line specifically for $RED Coin), and potentially for random cameo raffles for TikTok. $RED will also give access to private channels in Discord once that launches.
Transaction - $RED will be used for video requests with fans, on-stream shoutouts, loadout requests, game wagers on Twitch, and merchandise purchases. Also potentially wants to push sponsors to buy coin instead of traditional contracts.

Grant - $1000

A 'yes' approves $RED coin and a $1000 treasury grant
A 'no' denies this prop.
author: 0x5ea400d06Afe7aebae54216aDfD7a4bF5f15F993
